A pregnant woman was attacked by a female with a knife here in Ky yesterday. The attacker lured the pregnant woman in to her home on false pretenses. ( AWARENESS ???) The attacker slashed at the pregnant woman to kill, in an attempt to get the womans unborn baby . The badly slashed pregnant woman fought back, got the knife away from the attacker, and killed the attacker with it. Justice served.
It's a good thing that the woman was safe. The people who engage in such devious endeavours are dispicable creatures. They should be, if captured, locked away from society.

A similar situation happened where I live, except, the pregnant girl was shot and the baby cut from her womb, with the baby dying. That was a year ago, and last week the accused was sent to a mental ward. 
 Some punishment. She will be out on the street in another year.
 
 Justice--what justice?

It's a good thing that the woman was safe. The people who engage in such devious endeavours are dispicable creatures. They should be, if captured, locked away from society.
No...they should be killed, as was the perp in the first post. Hooray for the good guys!

Well done by the pregnant woman who defended herself.
 
 As for the shooter, she should be kept locked away, much like Reagan's attacker.
